alert.note: Alert for Marble and Glen Canyons; Northeast Plateaus and Mesas Hwy 264 Northward (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 07 at 9:46AM MST until January 07 at 12:00PM MST by NWS Flagstaff
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL NOON MST TODAY ABOVE 3500 FEET... * WHAT...Snow above 3500 feet. Additional snow accumulations of up to one inch. Winds gusting as high as 35 mph. * WHERE...Areas above 3500 feet near Page. * WHEN...Until noon MST today. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. Patchy blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility. Additional snow forecast from 9 AM Today to noon Today: Page 0 to 1 inches.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

area.areaDesc: Marble and Glen Canyons; Northeast Plateaus and Mesas Hwy 264 Northward
